name: Cauliflower soup
recipeInstructions: 1. Melt the butter in a saucepan over a medium heat and fry the onion, until softened.
2. Add the cauliflower and vegetable stock, bring to the boil and simmer for 5-6 minutes, or until the cauliflower is cooked.
3. Transfer into a food processor, add the Stilton and blend until smooth.
